name: Guide for Street Fighter V - Frame Data, Move Punisher, and More!
name_original: Guide for Street Fighter V - Frame Data, Move Punisher, and More!
description:
Be the first on the planet to have the ONE AND ONLY STREET FIGHTER V MOBILE GUIDE! And best of all? THIS IS ABSOLUTELY FREE! This app is created by a die hard fighter fan for the die hard fighter fan! Check out my other fighting game guides as well!

PLEASE NOTE: This guide is going to be updated throughout the entire beta process up until the full game is released. After the full game is released, this app will continue to evolve as the app for the full SF5 game so you will never have to download another SF5 app! WHEN NEW CHARACTER MOVE LISTS ARE FOUND OUT THEY WILL BE ADDED UP UNTIL ALL CHARACTERS IN FINAL GAME ARE IN THE APP!

INCLUDED IN THIS APP IS THE ALL NEW COMBO CREATOR TOOL! THIS ALLOWS YOU TO CREATE YOUR OWN COMBOS WITH THE TOOL AND HAVE THEM DISPLAY BACK TO YOU IN THE MOVE FORMAT. CHECK OUT THE SCREEN SHOT TO SEE HOW IT WORKS! IT'S SO EASY! ALSO CHECK IT OUT IN MY MKX APP!

So what's included in the app?

Currently there are all 16 launch characters now included!

For each character you have the following sections:

*V-Moves: This lists the V-Skill, V-Trigger, and V-Reversal for each character as well as a description.
*Normal Throws: Also includes air throws for those who have them.
*Unique Attacks: Lists character specific special normals, and TARGET COMBOS if they exist for the character.
*Special Moves: The complete list of known/released special moves for the character.
*Critical Arts: The list of Critical Art(s) that each character has.
*Custom Combos: With the new "move keyboard" you can enter your combo name, some notes for it, and the moves for it, and have it displayed to you in the format of the other moves.
*Frame Data: Quickly look at a moves list and find out the ever important frame data and move data.
*Move Punisher: If you don't want to read frame data, select your opponent and their move and find out what moves you have can punish those attacks.
*Notes: Save notes for each character on a character by character basis

If you want to see how the MOVE PUNISHER and FRAME DATA works, check out my latest MKX app and you will see exactly how it works! It's a very useful tool!

This app is free but has an in-app purchase to upgrade to the Pro Version which will remove the ads and it will also allow you to save more than 2 Custom Combos per character. The free version is restricted to 2 Custom Combos per character. This app will evolve into the SF5 app once the full game is out so you will never need to download another app!

Well what are you waiting for? Grab the ONE AND ONLY Street Fighter V app on the app store absolutely free!

Legal Disclaimer:
This app is not an official guide or at all associated with the game's developer or publisher. All descriptions, graphics, and information are copyright to their respective owners and usage for this app falls within fair use guidelines. All graphics used in this app are 100% user created. This app is created solely for the creators love of the game and to help others further develop their skills at the game.
